titleStmt.title: SII 12.186: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 186. (A.R. No. 505 of 1926). ON THE SAME WALL.

summary.p: In this damaged inscription, the chief's name is lost, but the regnal year 14 is preserved. It registers three transactions, viz., (1) a gift of land by Arasāḻvāṉ Ārāvamudāḻvāṉ to the temple of [Uḍai]yavaṉ Vaḍataḷi-[Uḍaiyār] at Ulagaḷandasōḻa[chaturvēdimaṅgalam] for offerings and worship; (2) a purchase of some land from the same person by the dēvakanmis of the temple from money realised by the sale of temple jewels; and (3) a gift of another bit of land which was received from a certain brahman to whom this person had given a loan. All these lands were now given for offerings and worship in the temple. Since this inscription appears to be identical with the previous one, the former may be attributed to Kōpperuñjiṅgadēva.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī tevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 4vatu I[ṣa] putaṉkiḻamaiyum �
ttunāḷ viruta[ rājabhaya] ṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu śrī Ulakaḷantacoḻac yavaṉ vaṭataḷiyuṭai
l Ātica[ ṇṭeśva ra] tevakaṉmikaḷukku cāḻvāṉ Ārāvamutāḻvā ṉeṉ . Inṉāyaṉārkku pūjaikkum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka nān tiruppa
ṭiyil nirvārttukkuṭutta nāyaṉār tiruvāparaṇam viṟṟu Eṉ pakkal vilaikoṇṭa nilam Orumā varaikkāṇi muntirikaiyum Āka nilam Orumāvarai
muntirikaiye lakāle nampikku taṉicu kuṭutta kācukku taṉ makaṉ Āmaruviniraimeyttāṉ peril taṉ tampi tirucciṟṟampala nampi pakkalum pā
ratāyaṉ veṇṇaikkū Āmaruviniraimeyttāṉ Eṉṟut tirivu Iṭṭu tanta tirucciṟṟampalavatikku meṟku Irācentiracoḻavāykkālukku teṟku
mutaṟkaṇṇāṟṟu nālāntuṇṭa ṅkaṇṇāṟṟu nālāntuṇṭattu nilam mukkāṇiyum Āka nilam Irumāvarai muntirikaiyum Ippaṭikaḷāl kuṭut
teṉ Inta Ārāvamutāḻvāṉeṉ . Eḻutiṉamaikkum Ivvārāmu tāḻvāṉ s Aijñ Aiyāṉamaikkum Ivvūr Ulakaḷantacoḻaviṇṇakar Emperumā
ṉ tirumuṟṟattu kāṇiuṭaiya tiruuṭaiyāril gau kūrnampi Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Innilan tiriviṭṭuk kuṭutta kāśya pan Āmaruviniraimeyttāṉ Eḻutteṉṟum kāśya pan Aḻaki
yatirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ paṭṭaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Iṭṭa kavuṇiyaṉ cikṛṣṇa paṭṭan peru marutūr karuṇākaranampi ciṟukoṭṭaiyūr cuppiramaṇya paṭṭar comayājiyar ṣome of the inscribed stones are lost.|
Digital edition of SII 12.186 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
